text: @Milbank The POTUS says the Coronavirus is a hoax, like the Russian hoax and the Impeachment hoax. Meaning, it's no hoax at all.  Do yourself a favor and wash your hands and stay aware that this thing spreads easily.  Pray that this administration really does get a handle on this thing. https://t.co/L2DRD9QJr4

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
